name: Howard SEIDMAN and Ronald Kerwood, Petitioners, v. Raymond MICHITTI, William J. Siderio, Jr., Consolidated Mortgage Corporation, Provident Bank of Maryland, and Provident Mortgage Corporation, Respondents

parties: Howard SEIDMAN and Ronald Kerwood, Petitioners, v. Raymond MICHITTI, William J. Siderio, Jr., Consolidated Mortgage Corporation, Provident Bank of Maryland, and Provident Mortgage Corporation, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 29th day of October, 1997, the Petition for Alowance of Appeal is GRANTED. This matter is REMANDED to the trial court for further proceedings in accord with this Court’s recent decision in Cheeseman v. Lethal Exterminator, Inc., — Pa. -, 701 A.2d 156 (1997).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert A. Davitch, Stephen G. Console, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
Howard SEIDMAN and Ronald Kerwood, Petitioners, v. Raymond MICHITTI, William J. Siderio, Jr., Consolidated Mortgage Corporation, Provident Bank of Maryland, and Provident Mortgage Corporation, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 29, 1997.
Robert A. Davitch, Stephen G. Console, Philadelphia, for petitioner.
